definition: to do/to manage/to handle/to go about/to run/to set up/to deal with

public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: Article summary office automation and records management relations and trend of development.
sentences.chinese: 文章簡述辦公自動化與檔案管理的關係及發展趨勢。

sentences.english: I am looking out for office automation equipment like currency counting machines etc for Indian markets. Kindly provide details of same.
sentences.chinese: 尋找供應印度市場的辦公自動化機器如點鈔機等等。

sentences.english: Testing the bluetooth office automation networks in the Nayong power plant.
sentences.chinese: 對納雍發電廠藍牙辦公自動化網絡進行了性能測試。
